text: Abdul Amir Sabri ( , (born 1964) is a former Iraqi international football player, who played for Iraq in the 1988 Gulf Cup of Nations. ==Honors== ===Local=== ;Salahaddin *Iraqi League : 1982–83 ===International=== ;Iraq * Gulf Cup of Nations : 1988 ==References== ==External links== * A report for the 1988 Gulf Cup of Nations *Al-Minaa Club: Sailors of south Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Al-Mina'a SC players Category:Al-Bahri players Category:Sportspeople from Basra Category:Iraq international footballers
title: Abdul Amir Sabri
